column4: Hi, I need to run a KDE application (kftpgrabber) but I use gnome. I'm also low on hard disk space so I dont wnat to install kde fully. What can i apt-get to jsut allow me to run that application with gnome, and not waste space on getting all of kde, which i would never use?
i jsut need to run one kde application
is that application available in ubuntu repository?
